languages.text: Монумент, посвященный обретению династии фон Валанциус Торгового Патента — символа могущества и особой роли Вольного Торговца на службе Империуму.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк в основном пространстве палубы — про композицию из стати Императора и статуи Первого Валанциуса, который получает патент из рук императора.

languages.text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Монумент, посвященный обретению династии фон Валанциус Торгового Патента — символа могущества и особой роли Вольного Торговца на службе Империуму.

traits.locale_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.
A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.
A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

languages.text: 这座纪念碑是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获得贸易授状时竖立起来的，它象征着行商浪人的权力，以及行商浪人对帝国的特殊职责。
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 这座纪念碑是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获得贸易许可证时竖立起来的，它象征着行商浪人的权力，以及行商浪人对帝国的特殊职责。

languages.text: Un monumento dedicado a la adquisición por parte de la dinastía von Valancius de la Patente de Comercio, símbolo del poder y el papel especial del Comerciante Independiente al servicio del Imperium.
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Un monumento dedicado a la adquisición por parte de la dinastía von Valancius de la Patente de Comercio, símbolo del poder y el papel especial del Comerciante Independiente al servicio del Imperium.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の通商許可証の取得に捧げられた記念碑。帝国への奉仕における自由開拓者の力と特別な役割の象徴。
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の貿易令状の取得に捧げられた記念碑。帝国への奉仕における自由開拓者の力と特別な役割の象徴。
フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の通商許可証の取得に捧げられた記念碑。帝国への奉仕における自由開拓者の力と特別な役割の象徴。

languages.text: Un monument dédié à l'obtention de la lettre de marque par la dynastie von Valancius, symbole de son pouvoir et du rôle particulier joué par la libre-marchande au service de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Un monument dédié à l'obtention de la lettre de marque par la dynastie von Valancius, symbole de son pouvoir et du rôle particulier joué par la libre-marchande au service de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Ein Denkmal zur Erinnerung an die Übergabe des Handelsbriefs – ein Symbol der Macht und der besonderen Aufgabe des Freihändlers in Diensten des Imperiums – an die Dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Ein Denkmal zur Erinnerung an die Übergabe des Handelsbriefs – ein Symbol der Macht und der besonderen Aufgabe des Freihändlers in Diensten des Imperiums – an die Dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: Von Valancius hanedanlığının Ticari Ruhsatname edinmesi şerefine dikilmiş bir anıt. Bu belge, İmparatorluk hizmetindeki Hür Tacirlere verilen yetkiyi ve özel rolü simgeler.
languages.original_text: A monument dedicated to the von Valancius dynasty's acquisition of the Warrant of Trade, a symbol of the power and special role of the Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius hanedanlığının Ticari Ruhsatname edinmesi şerefine dikilmiş bir anıt. Bu belge, İmparatorluk hizmetindeki Hür Tacirlere verilen yetkiyi ve özel rolü simgeler.
